price: Nígbà tí ó yẹra fún àwọn àti n̄ǹkan tí wọ́n ń jọ́sìn fún lẹ́yìn Allāhu, A sì ta á lọ́rẹ (ọmọ), ’Ishāƙ àti Ya‘ƙūb (ọmọọmọ rẹ̀). A sì ṣe ọ̀kọ̀ọ̀kan wọn ní Ànábì.¹
arabic: فَلَمَّا ٱعۡتَزَلَهُمۡ وَمَا يَعۡبُدُونَ مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ وَهَبۡنَا لَهُۥٓ إِسۡحَٰقَ وَيَعۡقُوبَۖ وَكُلّٗا جَعَلۡنَا نَبِيّٗا

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: falammā iʿ'tazalahum wamā yaʿbudūna min dūni al-lahi wahabnā lahu is'ḥāqa wayaʿqūba wakullan jaʿalnā nabiyyan
